categories: Category:Sith of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire
Category:Unidentified Sith of the One Sith

nodes.text: A member of Darth Krayt's New Sith Order, this Zabrak Sith was part of the strikeforce sent by Regent Morlish Veed to capture Emperor Roan Fel on the planet Agamar. The Zabrak fought against Jedi Knight Shado Vao but was killed in the process. Following Sith tradition, this Zabrak wielded a red lightsaber.
